Synopsis: Add social accounts for the authenticated user
Description: Add one or more social accounts to the authenticated user's profile. This endpoint is accessible with the `user` scope.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Add-GitHubUserSocial -AccountUrls 'https://twitter.com/MyTwitterAccount', 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/MyCompany'
Adds the Twitter and LinkedIn accounts to the authenticated user's profile.
